description: Lisotem is a wanderer through time.
Cercey is an officer of the In-Between forces, given command over the occupation forces of a few cities.
Alvart is the heir to the noble House of Alquart, based in the Alquartian highlands.
Of all of the information known about her, Lusin is known to be the Goddess on the moon, having interacted with Arev as an equal.

allegiance: Ninth Order of the Solar Sanctum
description: Cherminon rose through the ranks of the Solar orders, eventually arising to the position of grandmaster of the Ninth Order, the youngest of any grandmaster in any order.
The Earl is an enigmatic figure appearing seemingly out of nowhere.
Novana has appeared as The Earl's maid.
